name: SK-Sync
description: Spawns/controls OpenClaw sessions via Super-Kanban entities (SK-Sync)

baseUrl.label: Base URL
baseUrl.help: Accepted: /super-kanban or /super-kanban/api (or even /super-kanban/api/integrations/openclaw). Internally normalized to end with /api.

bearerToken.label: Bearer Token (READ_UI)
bearerToken.help: Used for read-only endpoints (GET). Sent as Authorization: Bearer <token>. Env: SUPERKANBAN_BEARER_TOKEN.

apiKey.label: API Key (WRITE_INTEGRATION)
apiKey.help: Used for write endpoints (POST/PATCH). Sent as x-api-key: <key>. Env: SUPERKANBAN_API_KEY.

authHeader.label: Legacy Auth Header (deprecated)
authHeader.help: Back-compat single header line, e.g. 'X-Api-Key: ...' or 'Authorization: Bearer ...'. Prefer bearerToken/apiKey.

authHeaderRead.label: Auth Header (READ override)
authHeaderRead.help: Override header for read endpoints only. Value must be 'Header-Name: value'.

authHeaderWrite.label: Auth Header (WRITE override)
authHeaderWrite.help: Override header for write endpoints only. Value must be 'Header-Name: value'.
